ComicInfo.Title: When the Thunder Fails!
ComicInfo.Summary: When the Thunder Fails!: Thor tries to help the people of Pangoria as the Celestials prepare to render their judgment on the planet.
ComicInfo.Notes: Tagged with ComicTagger 1.6.0a13.dev122 using info from Grand Comics Database on 2024-06-15 14:27:17. [Issue ID 44230]
ComicInfo.AgeRating: Approved by the Comics Code Authority
ComicInfo.Characters: Wasp,Balder (cameo flashback),Warriors Three [Fandral,the Celestials [Arishem,Avengers [Captain America,Exitar],Hogun,Sif (cameo flashback),Pegas,Captain Marvel [Monica Rambeau]] (cameo flashback),Black Knight,Hercules,Odin (cameo flashback),Myla,Thor,Volstagg] (cameo flashback)
